PRIVATE EVENTs
Please review a brief summary of our event space offerings prior to submitting an event submission below.
Looking for private event space, large party reservations or in-house catering?
you‚Äôre in the right place!
We‚Äôve thoughtfully curated the perfect venue for your next event‚Äîfeaturing flexible entertainment areas, dining spaces, dance floors, presentation equipment, dedicated private staff, in-house catering options and a full bar equipped with everything you need to host an unforgettable gathering.
FLEXIBLE OPTIONS
-  event specific TAILORED MENUs
Submit an event inquiry at the link below and we will tailor a list of menu offerings to best suit your needs. Browse our packaged event menus and customize your experience with a variety of in-house options including.
Full Buffet Style Catering
Cocktail Appetizers or Party Platters
Tiered Open-Bar Packages for all budgets
Pre-Purchased Drink Tickets
Champagne Toast or Themed Cocktails
Event add-ons such as Live Music, DJ‚Äôs, Event Photographers & more
endless event options
-  FLEXIBLE room capacity -
We‚Äôve hosted a wide variety of private events from social mixers, birthdays, private dinners, holiday parties, wedding receptions, bridal showers, corporate events, live performances and everything in between.
Our standing capacity is¬†60 persons per room
or 120 persons total for complete house rental. For
private dinners we recommend no more than 40 persons per room
pricing & availability
-  NO RENTAL FEES.. seriously
You read that right!
There‚Äôs no rental fee to book our space
. Instead, we use a Minimum Spend model, which simply put, means your group just needs to meet a set spend on food, beverage or package add-ons. This ‚ÄúMinimum Spend‚Äù amount is based on several criteria including date & time, event duration, and any other special accommodations that might be needed.
Event dates book quickly! For the best chance of securing your preferred date and time, we recommend booking at least 2‚Äì4 weeks in advance.
Get started with your booking by clicking the link below and filling out an event submission form.
GET STARTED!
We‚Äôre on it!
If you‚Äôve already submitted a form but haven‚Äôt heard back from our team, or need immediate assistance,
we welcome you to follow up by email or phone after submitting.
We typically respond within 24‚Äì48 hours after event submission
üìß
events@copadtsp.com
727-623-9199

ABOUT US
Voted one of Tampa Bay‚Äôs Favorite Date Night Destinations!
At COPA, cultures combine offering a dynamic fusion of Latin American and Caribbean flair in the heart of downtown St. Petersburg. A true middle ground for lovers of craft cocktails, authentic cuisine, hookah, and Afro-Latin sounds ‚Äî COPA is where taste and rhythm meet.
Join us in the morning for casual caf√© service, or indulge in an evening of intimate ambiance and elevated dining unlike anything else in the city.
Locally Owned & Operated since 2019
-
Learn more about our story
NOW OPEN FOR BREAKFAST & LUNCH!
COPA has recently expanded!
Now we‚Äôre channeling that same magic next door at
CAFE COPA
‚Äîa sun-lit caf√© by day, and a candle lit cocktail lounge by night. Stop in for artisanal coffee, breakfast or lunch, stay productive with free Wi-Fi, or swing by after dark for craft cocktails, conversational sounds, live entertainment, and local showcases in our gallery style space. Ready to explore? Tap below!

RESERVATIONS
Enjoy full service at the bar, refined table service indoors, or relaxed seating on our outdoor patio.
While
not required
, we offer a limited number of evening reservations through our
Yelp Reservation Platform
. If reservations appear full online, we recommend calling ahead for the most accurate availability and estimated wait times.
727-623-9199
To better serve all our guests, weekend party sizes are limited to a maximum of 8 guests. For large party reservations or private event inquiries, please contact us
[

for rates and availability.
